Test Case Description: Check user login with valid credentials
Pre-conditions: User is registered with valid credentials.
Test Steps:
1. Go to https://qa-course-01.andersenlab.com/
2. Enter valid email ID. 
3. Enter password. 
4. Click submit.
Expected Result: User should be able to login successfully.
Postconditions: User is redirected to the dashboard.

Test Case Description: Check user login with invalid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Go to https://qa-course-01.andersenlab.com/ 
2. Enter invalid email ID. 
3. Enter password. 
4. Click submit.
Expected Result: An error message should be displayed.
Postconditions: User remains on the login page.

Test Case Description: Verify the registration page loads successfully
Test Steps:
1. Go to https://qa-course-01.andersenlab.com/
2. Navigate to the registration page.
Expected Result: Registration page should load without errors.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with all valid inputs
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name.
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter valid email. 
5. Enter valid password. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Password123
Postconditions: User is redirected to the login page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with password less than 8 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name.
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter valid email. 
5. Enter password with less than 8 characters. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Pass
Expected Result: Error message indicating password must be at least 8 characters.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with password more than 20 characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name. 
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter valid email. 
5. Enter password with more than 20 characters. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Password1233456789000000000000000
Expected Result: Error message indicating password must not exceed 20 characters.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with empty name field
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Leave name field empty.
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter valid email. 
5. Enter valid password. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Password123
Expected Result: Error message indicating name is required.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with invalid email format
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name. 
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter invalid email format. 
5. Enter valid password. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: johnexample.com 
Password/Confirm: Password123
Expected Result: Error message indicating invalid email format.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name. 
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter valid email. 
5. Enter valid password. 
6. Enter different password in confirm password field. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Password123/Password321
Expected Result: Error message indicating passwords do not match.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with all fields empty
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Leave all fields empty. 
3. Submit the form.
Expected Result: Error messages indicating all fields are required.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.

Test Case Description: Verify registration with already registered email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page. 
2. Enter valid name. 
3. Enter date of birth.
4. Enter an email that is already registered. 5. Enter valid password. 
6. Confirm password. 
7. Submit the form.
Test Data:
Name: John 
Last name: Doe 
DoB: 01.01.2001
Email: john@example.com 
Password/Confirm: Password123
Expected Result: Error message indicating email is already registered.
Postconditions: User remains on the registration page.
